fr.umlv.wallj.game

Class Board

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.umlv.wallj.game.Board
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Displayable

    public class Board
extends java.lang.Object
implements Displayable
    A board represents a whole level of a game. It contains all the info about the current level :\n The player field reprensents the player, with its position. The bombLeft field is the number of remaining bomb which the player can land. The world is the JBox2D world which manage all th physic of the level. The grid field is the grid of all the walls, loaded from the level.txt file. The width/length fields are the dimension of the level. The bombMap field is the map containing all the Bomb. It is reprensresented by a HashMap because the order does not matter, and we want a quick access to the bomb. That's also why the Key of the map is a Vec2, in order to represents the coordinates of the bomb, thus we can quickly have access to the bomb in a (x, y) given position. The garbageList field is the list of all the garbage of the level.
    Author:
    odomar

        Parameters:

        world - : a world for JBox2D.
        Returns:
        a board to represent the level.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - when the required level.txt is not found, or another IOException happens.

        public boolean isValidLevel()
        Test if the current level is legal or not : The level is legal if it exists a structure with many walls/trashes who come back to the start case (a polygon).
        Returns:
        true if the level is legal, if not return false;

      • charIsLegal

        public static boolean charIsLegal(int c)
        Tests wether the char represented by c is a legal character or not.
        Parameters:
        c - the int representing the character to test.
        Returns:
        true if c is either a wall, a trashcan, a garbage, the player, or an empty case, false if not.

        public void draw(java.awt.Graphics2D graphics)

        Increments or decrements the timeLeft of the nomb at player position.
        Parameters:

      • runBomb

        public boolean runBomb()
        Runs all the bomb of the map, decreasing their timeLeft by Sizes.LOOP_TIME (divided by 1000 because TimeLeft is in seconds). Checks if the bomb must explode, and make it explode if needed
        Returns:
        false if the bombMap still has elements, true if not.

      • removeGarbage

        public void removeGarbage()
        Removes all the garbage from the grid. We don't need them in the grid anymore for A*, and we need display an empty case instead. The garbage still exists in garbageList.

      • destroyGarbage

        public void destroyGarbage()
        Destroys the garbage that has the "DESTROYED" flag in Body.userData. Destroys means destroying the fixture of the body, and then remove the garbage from the list.

      • worldStep

        public void worldStep()
        Steps once the world of the board.

      • setPhysics

        public void setPhysics()
        Set all the physics and more generally all that must be done before the physic phase of the game. Hides the player and creates a collision handler.

      • isWon

        public boolean isWon()
        Tells if the gale is currently won, which means there is no more garbage in th list.
        Returns:
        a boolean telling if the gale is won.
